text: Decimus Junius Silanus Torquatus (16 AD - 64 AD) was a senator in the Roman Empire. He was recognized as consul in 53 and served with Quintus Haterius Antoninus.Paul Gallivan, "The Fasti for the Reign of Claudius", Classical Quarterly, 28 (1978), pp. 409, 425 He was the son of Aemilia Lepida and Marcus Junius Silanus Torquatus.Ronald Syme, The Augustan Aristocracy (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1986), pp. 188, 192 == References == Category:16 births Category:64 deaths
title: Decimus Junius Silanus Torquatus
